original_text: He did not need anyone to tell him what people are like. He knew already what was really in each person.
korean_text: 또 사람에 대하여 누구의 증언도 받으실 필요가 없었으니 이는 그가 친히 사람의 속에 있는 것을 아셨음이니라

sentences.original_text: He did not need anyone to tell him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 누군가에게 말을 들을 필요가 없었다

sentences.original_text: what was really in each person
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람 안에 실제로 무엇이 있는지
